Uses of Class
com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr.OrderBy

Packages that use OrderBy
com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr   
 

Uses of OrderBy in com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr
 

Methods in com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr that return OrderBy
 OrderBy OrderBy.add(String name, Criteria.Order order)
          Adds a new field to order by and its specified order.
 OrderBy OrderBy.add(String name, Criteria.Order order, Criteria.NullOrder nullOrder)
          Adds a new field to order by and its specified order.
 OrderBy OrderBy.add(String name, Criteria.Order order, Criteria.NullOrder nullOrder, org.apache.hadoop.io.RawComparator<?> comparator)
          Same as OrderBy#add(String, Order) but adding the possibility to specify a custom comparator for that field.
 OrderBy OrderBy.addSchemaOrder(Criteria.Order order)
          This method,unlike the traditional OrderBy#add(String, Order, NullOrder, RawComparator) method, adds a symbolic elements to order by.
static OrderBy OrderBy.parse(String orderBy)
          Parse in the form "field1:asc, field2:desc,...,fieldn:asc|null_smallest"
Examples:
"f1,f2,f3"
"f1:asc,f2:desc,f3"
"f1,f2:asc|null_smallest,f3:desc|null_biggest"
 

Methods in com.datasalt.pangool.tuplemr with parameters of type OrderBy
 void TupleMRConfigBuilder.setOrderBy(OrderBy ordering)
          Sets the criteria to sort the tuples by.
 void TupleMRConfigBuilder.setSpecificOrderBy(String schemaName, OrderBy ordering)
          Sets how tuples from the specific schemaName will be sorted after being sorted by commonOrderBy and schemaOrder
